title: 求帮忙看报错!!!!谢谢!!!!
author: cat52220
txt_content:
[00:49:57] [KCauldron version retrievier/WARN] [KCauldron: KVersionRetriever/]: Error occured during retriving version

请告诉我如何解决!!!!感谢!!!!
